} } })(); /*]]>*/</script><script type="text/javascript">/*<![CDATA[*/
        require(['istats-1', 'orb/cookies', 'orb/fig'], function (istats, bbccookies, orbFig) {
            istats.addLabels({ 'bbc_mc': bbccookies.analyticsPolicyString() });

            var domesticBlqV = istats._getLabels().blq_v;
            var worldwideBlqV = istats._getLabels().blq_v + '-ww';

            function setBlqVLabel(fig) {
                if (fig.geo.isUK()) {
                    istats.addLabels({'blq_v': domesticBlqV});
                } else {
                    istats.addLabels({'blq_v': worldwideBlqV});
                }
            }

            // Guess with synchronous API first (might be cached and the async version might be too slow)
            setBlqVLabel(orbFig);
            orbFig.load(function (fig) {
                setBlqVLabel(fig);
            });
        });
    /*]]>*/</script>  <meta name="apple-itunes-app" content="app-id=416580485, app-argument=bbciplayer://www.bbc.co.uk/iplayer?bbc_referrer=iplayer-responsive-web" />  <!--[if (gt IE 8) | (IEMobile)]><!--> <link id="stylesheet-default" href="//iplayer-web.files.bbci.co.uk/tviplayer-static-assets/10.43.0-1/style/stylesheets/homepage-v1/default.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <!--<![endif]--> <!--[if lte IE 8]> <link id="stylesheet-iedefault" href="//iplayer-web.files.bbci.co.uk/tviplayer-static-assets/10.43.0-1/style/stylesheets/homepage-v1/default-ie.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" /> <![endif]-->   <script type="text/javascript"> require.config({  baseUrl: '//iplayer-web.files.bbci.co.uk/tviplayer-static-assets/10.43.0-1/script/built',  "paths": { 'jquery-1.9': '//static.bbci.co.uk/frameworks/jquery/0.4.1/sharedmodules/jquery-1.9.1', 'relay-1':'//static.bbci.co.uk/frameworks/relay/0.2.6/sharedmodules/relay-1', uasclient: '//static.bbci.co.uk/uasclient/0.1.40/modules/uasclient', 'swfobject-2': '//static.bbci.co.uk/frameworks/swfobject/0.1.10/sharedmodules/swfobject-2', lodash: 'lib/lodash', resourceTimingCompression: 'lib/resourceTimingCompression', text: 'lib/require/text', json: 'lib/require/json', i18n: 'lib/require/i18n', locales: 'lib/require/locales', jRespond: 'utils/jRespond', mustache: 'lib/mustache', redux: 'lib/redux.min', handlebars: 'lib/handlebars.amd.min', 'handlebars.runtime': 'lib/handlebars.amd.min', pal: '/iplayer/js', 'bump-3': '//emp.bbci.co.uk/emp/bump-3/bump-3', 'demi-1': '//static.bbci.co.uk/frameworks/demi/0.10.0/sharedmodules/demi-1', svg4everybody: 'lib/svg4everybody.min', atomicLibrary: 'lib/atomic-component-library' }, "waitSeconds": 30 }); istats.setSite('tvandiplayer');  }); </script> <noscript> <style type="text/css"> .r-image .img { display:none; } </style> </noscript> <!--[if IE 7]>  <script src="http://static.bbci.co.uk/tviplayer/1.140.0/script/built/lib/json2.js"></script>  <![endif]-->  <script src="//iplayer-web.files.bbci.co.uk/tviplayer-static-assets/10.43.0-1/script/built/lib/picturefill.min.js"></script>   <script type="text/javascript"> if (window.bbccookies && window.bbccookies.cookiesEnabled() && window.bbccookies.readPolicy('performance')) { document.write('<script type="text/javascript" src="//service.maxymiser.net/cdn/mbbccoUK/js/mmcore.js"></' + 'script>'); } </script>  </head> <body class="homepage iplayer no-touch" data-page-type="home"> <noscript><p style="position: absolute; top: -999em"><img src="//sa.bbc.co.uk/bbc/bbc/s?name=iplayer.tv.page&amp;ml_name&#x3D;webmodule&amp;ml_version&#x3D;62&amp;blq_e&#x3D;orbit&amp;blq_r&#x3D;orbit&amp;blq_s&#x3D;orbit&amp;blq_v&#x3D;default&amp;language&#x3D;en&pal_route=iplayerHome&pal_webapp=tviplayer&prod_name=iplayer&iplayer_type=main&page_layout=stream&object_count_stream=21&app_name=iplayer&app_type=responsive&app_version=1.140.0&page_type=home&language=en-GB&location_nation=eng&location_region=london&amp;blq_js_enabled=0" height="1" width="1" alt=""></p></noscript><!-- BBCDOTCOM bodyFirst --><div id="bbccom_interstitial_ad" class="bbccom_display_none"></div><div id="bbccom_interstitial" class="bbccom_display_none"><script type="text/javascript">/*<![CDATA[*/ (function() { if (window.bbcdotcom && bbcdotcom.config.isActive('ads')) { googletag.cmd.push(function() { googletag.display('bbccom_interstitial');   <div id="blq-content" data-site-type="default">  <div id="main" class="main homepage tvip-clearfix" role="main">    <h1 class="tvip-hide">BBC iPlayer Homepage</h1> <div class="find-tools-container">     <div class="find-tools tvip-clearfix"> <div class="find-tool search"> <div class="find-tool-inner"> <div class="search-compact" role="search"> <div class="search-trigger"> <a href="#"> <h2 class="tvip-hide"> Open iPlayer search </h2> <span class="tvip-hide"> Search results appear automatically under the next heading. Use the arrow keys to navigate these and Enter to select them. </span> <span class="icon search-icon"></span> </a> <form id="find-tool-search" action="/iplayer/search" class="search-form tvip-clearfix b-r"> <input type="text" name="q" class="search-input placeholder-fix" placeholder="Find a programme" tabindex="-1" autocomplete="off" /> <input type="submit" value="Find" class="search-submit" /> </form> </div> </div> <div class="search-expanded">     <div class="programme-finder b-f b-r tvip-clearfix" id="programme-finder"> <form class="programme-finder-form" action="/iplayer/search" method="get" > <div class="search-wrapper"> <label for="programme-finder-query" class="tvip-hide"> Find a programme on BBC iPlayer </label> <input maxlength="50" type="text" name="q" value="" placeholder="Find a programme on BBC iPlayer" class="search-input placeholder-fix" autocomplete="off" id="programme-finder-query" /> <span class="search-button-container"> <button type="submit" class="search-button" id="programme-finder-submit"> <span class="search-icon"></span> <span class="search-button-text">Find</span> </button> </span> </div> </form> <div class="programme-finder-results"> <div class="popular-searches-container">  <div class="popular-searches" id="recent-searches"> <h3 class="header"> Your recent searches </h3> <ul> <script data-search-type="recent">{{term}}</a></li> {{/terms}} </script> </ul> </div> <ul class="programme-finder-action-buttons tvip-hide"> <li id="recent-searches-clear"> <a href="#">Clear recent searches</a> </li> </ul> </div> <div id="autosuggest-container" class="suggestions-container"> <div id="popular-programmes-container" class="suggestions-container-section with-border"> <script class="js-template"> <div id="a-z-suggestion"> <h3 class="heading">A-Z</h3> <div class="right"> <p class="suggestion"><a href="/iplayer/a-z/{{letter-url}}" class="stat" data-search-type="atoz">All programmes starting with '<strong>{{letter}}</strong>'</a></p> </div> </div> </script> </div> </div> </div> </div>  </div> </div> </div> <div class="search-popup"> <div class="popup-content"></div> <a class="close" tabindex="-1" href="#"><span class="tvip-hide">Close iPlayer search</span> <i aria-hidden="true" class="icon tviplayericon tviplayericon-no"></i> </a> </div> <div class="find-tool a-z"> <div class="find-tool-inner">     <a class="a-z-link" id="a-z-link" href="/iplayer/a-z"> <span class="icon"></span> <h2><span class="tvip-hide">A-Z </span>Programme List</h2> </a>  </div> </div> <div class="a-z-popup"> <div class="popup-header"> <h3> A-Z Programme List </h3> </div> <div class="popup-content"> <div role="navigation"> <h3 class="tvip-hide">A-Z</h3>     <ol class="letter-list             <div class="overlay overlay--with-details overlay--with-icon">
    <div class="overlay__text">
        <p class="overlay__text__inner typo typo--canary">Also pitching to the Dragons is a serial inventor who demos his garden shed innovation.</p>
    </div>
      <div class="overlay__icon icon-block"><i aria-hidden="true" class="icon tviplayericon tviplayericon-iplayer"></i></div>
      <div class="overlay__details">
          <p class="overlay__label typo typo--robin">
                <strong>59 Mins</strong>
                  <span aria-hidden="true">|</span>
                <strong class="overlay__label__highlight">BBC Two</strong>
          </p>
            <p class="typo typo--bullfinch">Available for 29 days</p>
      </div>
</div>

        </div>
    </div>
</a>

        </ol>

        <p class="thumbnail-item__subtitle typo typo--canary">4/7 Granville needs a plan to flog some out of date puddings</p>

    </picture>
</div>

            <div class="thumbnail-item__icon icon-block"><i aria-hidden="true" class="icon tviplayericon tviplayericon-iplayer"></i></div>
            <div class="thumbnail-item__icon__label">1 Min</div>
    </div>
</a>

            </li>
        </ol>
    </li>
    <li class="grid__item js-category-mvt one-whole g4--one-half">
        <ol class="grid__row trailers__grid__row">
            <li class="grid__item one-half">
                <a
href="#trailers|p04m7s2r"

    <div class="thumbnail-item__desc">

                    Documentary
            </strong>
        </div>

        <p class="thumbnail-item__subtitle typo typo--canary">Exploring the issues affecting twentysomethings today</p>
    </div>

        <div class="rs-image">

            require(['orb/fig'], function(orbFig) {
                orbFig.load(function(fig) {
                    if (fig.geo.isUK()) {
                        require(['orb/async/_footerpromo'], function(promo) {
                            promo.init('//navpromo.api.bbci.co.uk', '')
                        })
                    }
                });
            });
        }
    });</script><script type="text/javascript">/*<![CDATA[*/

            fig.load(function(fig) {
                if (fig.geo.isUK()) {
                    nav.loadJs('//nav.files.bbci.co.uk/orbit/1.0.0-346.93a6467/js/edr.min.js');
                }
            });
        });
    /*]]>*/</script><script type="text/javascript">require(["istats-1","orb/cookies"],function(t,o){if(o.isAllowed("s1"))try{if(!require.s.contexts._.config.paths.idcta)return void t.invoke();require(["idcta/idcta-1"],function(o){o&&"function"==typeof o.getIStatsLabels&&t.addLabels(o.getIStatsLabels()),t.invoke()},function(t){throw t})}catch(o){console&&"function"==typeof console.log&&console.log("an exception occurred while adding idcta labels to istats, invoking istats without them",o),t.invoke()}});</script><script type="text/javascript">require.config({
            paths: {
                "mybbc/templates": '//mybbc.files.bbci.co.uk/notification-ui/2.6.12-mvt/templates',
                "mybbc/notifications": '//mybbc.files.bbci.co.uk/notification-ui/2.6.12-mvt/js'
            }
        });

        require(['mybbc/notifications/NotificationsMain', 'idcta/idcta-1'], function (NotificationsMain, idcta) {
            var loadNotifications = function (fig) {
                if (fig.geo.isUK()) {
                    NotificationsMain.run(idcta, '//mybbc.files.bbci.co.uk/notification-ui/2.6.12-mvt/');
                }
            };
            var orbFig = window.orb.fig;
            if (typeof orbFig.load === 'function') {
                // Use new async API from Orbit
                orbFig.load(loadNotifications, loadNotifications);
            } else {
                // Use old sync-only API from PAL orbfig project
                loadNotifications(orbFig);
            }
        });</script><script type="text/javascript">if( window.SEARCHBOX.suppress === false && window.SEARCHBOX.locale && /^en-?.*?/.test(window.SEARCHBOX.locale) ){

     paths: {
       "search/searchbox": window.SEARCHBOX.searchboxAppStaticPrefix
     }
   });

     SearchboxDrawer.run(window.SEARCHBOX);
   });
